name: RBB Bancorp
description: RBB Bancorp is a financial holding company that operates through its wholly owned subsidiary, Royal Business Bank. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, RBB Bancorp primarily focuses on providing a comprehensive range of banking services to small and medium-sized businesses, as well as individuals. The bank offers various products, including commercial loans, personal loans, mortgage services, and deposit accounts, tailored to meet the unique needs of its diverse clientele. RBB Bancorp is dedicated to fostering relationships within the communities it serves, emphasizing customer service and localized banking. The bank's commitment to innovation is reflected in its adoption of advanced technologies to enhance the customer experience, including online banking and mobile banking solutions. As part of its growth strategy, RBB Bancorp actively seeks to expand its branch network and services, positioning itself as a trusted financial partner for its customers. With a focus on integrity, professionalism, and community engagement, RBB Bancorp strives to contribute positively to the economic development of the regions it serves.

seo.meta_description: Explore RBB Bancorp, a premier financial institution dedicated to providing personalized banking services to individuals and businesses. Learn about our commitment to community engagement and innovative financial products.

faq.question: What services does RBB Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: RBB Bancorp offers a variety of services including commercial loans, personal loans, mortgage services, and deposit accounts.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of RBB Bancorp?
faq.answer: Alan Thunberg is the CEO of RBB Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is RBB Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: RBB Bancorp is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.
